page.title: 15THINGS TO DO IN STRETTON
page.content: There are lots and lots of things to do in Church Stretton such as mini-golf, tennis, bowls, shopping, gliding, discos, bird watching, walking on hills, swimming and lots more. The golf, bowls and tennis is done in Church Stretton park and shopping is easy because there is nearly every thing you need like D.I.Y, clothes and food shops. There are lots of clubs like cubs on Tuesday, with lots of games like ping pong hockey and stuck in the mud. Youth club is on Mondays. There is table tennis, pool and darts to play. This costs nothing at all apart from drinks and food. There are also football, badminton, keep-fit, yoga, cricket, indoor bowls, and archery clubs, together with WI, photography, chess, musical groups and an annual Arts Festival.
